item.description:
Event Host: Keith Velia


Keith will be hosting a meet and greet with Will Gregory, Republican Candidate for Congress in CTâ€™s fourth congressional district.

This will be an important opportunity for the Libertarian/Ron Paul/Campaign for Liberty community in CT to hear firsthand what the candidate believes in, ask questions and provide insights into our opinions and vision for CT and the nation.

Please rsvp on this meetup AND contact Keith via phone or email and he will provide the address and maintain an estimate as to the size of the event.


Thank you for hosting this Keith. A number of us wanted to meet with Will.

barbara g.


Keith Velia
Kwv817@yahoo.com
Cell phone (646) 334 - 6144
item.name: Meet and Greet with Will Gregory 4th Congressional District Candidate
